snippet.title: Phantom of Zana Level 6, IT'S FREE ON STEAM. Link in description. No commentary,
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2437560/Phantom_of_Zana/

Phantom of Zana is a side scrolling action platformer. Grapple Hook, Wall Grabs, Air Dash, all that stuff! 

My design concept for Phantom of Zana was pretty much mash Zelda 2, MegaMan X, and Mario 3 together and add a grappling hook mechanic. While I certainly drew a lot of inspiration from those games. Phantom of Zana is unique enough to be it's own thing.

Twitter : https://twitter.com/SnuggleFryGames
